info.author: Guillaume Schworer
info.description:
Exospoc is a package intended to provide the expected angular separation, contrast ratio and polarization degree of an exoplanet candidate as a function of date, given the orbital and reflectance parameters.
Content available after article publication.
info.keywords: prediction exoplanet observability contrast separation polarization scattered light
info.name: exospoc
info.summary: Provides expected angular separation, contrast ratio and polarization degree of an exoplanet.
info.html_description: Exospoc is a package intended to provide the expected angular separation, contrast ratio and polarization degree of an exoplanet candidate as a function of date, given the orbital and reflectance parameters. Content available after article publication.
